answers.answer: Minimize your salt intake that also causes swelling

Drink lots of water and stay off your feet. Elevate your feet above your chest laying down, prop them up with a few pillows.If it's extremely swollen then it could be preeclampsia. Is it accompanied with headaches, seeing spots and dizziness??
Yes it is normal and just rest a lot  by the end of the day if I do thing that day my get are almost double it size amd some times my wedding rings don't Fit
It's normal as long as it's not so excessive that your swollen all the way up your legs and can't get shoes on at all etc. I can't even wear my wedding rings either and it ***** :(
Lots on healthy foods butbtry not to eat salt or at least not alot of foods with salt it helps to cut down(: youll be fine
